entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose `OutputCachePolicyBuilder.AddPolicy(IOutputCachePolicy)` as `public` #55809
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Cannot submit the form because no form on the page currently has that name. #55808
  • Upgraded to .net core 8.0 and now app_offline.htm to shutdown the app pool for code deployment hangs. #55807
  • [OutputCaching] `OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices` is always `null` during initialization #55805
  • .Net 5 losing HttpContext #55806
  • Blazor Identity and LocalStorage with InteractiveRenderMode #55799
    Backlog

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries, plaintext #55785
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #55784
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55790
  • restore fails #55795
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext, updates #55788

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #55811
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Remove unnecessary pragmas #55810
    needs-area-label
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5 #55800
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.7 #55759
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.6
  • Update branding to 6.0.32 #55758
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.31
  • Use span.Equals instead of string.Compare in JumpTables #55724
    Perf, community-contribution, area-routing, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix AntiforgeryMiddlewareTest for non-US date formats #55779
    area-mvc, community-contribution
